body:
So yeah, does anyone watch GoT?
I just started watching it and I'm nearly done season 2, loving it so far :D
This thread will just be for talking about it, and I want to know if anyone else in the community watches it and what their opinions are on it!
I want to ask you guys, who is your favourite character?
No spoilers please!! :)
body_tagged:

No spoilers please!! :)
title: Game of Thrones

replies.body:
I read the first book and half of the second one.

Jon ftw
replies.body_tagged:
I read the first book and half of the second one.

Jon ftw

replies.body: Game of thrones is fantastic :D.  I haven't read the books but I'm so far into the show I kinda don't want to.  Tyrion is best 8/8
replies.body_tagged: Game of thrones is fantastic :D.  I haven't read the books but I'm so far into the show I kinda don't want to.  Tyrion is best 8/8
